summary:
Rewards - Uncover Fraud and Get Rewarded!

 Easy Steps to Rewards - Spot Suspicious Activity, Gather Evidence, Report to KillScam, Claim your Rewards

 How We Review Your Reports - We utilize cutting-edge data providers and their respective toolset to ensure that we have the most accurate real-time information about an address. Only officially certified AML experts are reviewing submitted addresses. Approved addresses are added directly to the HAPI database with the "Scam" label
